image:image.image:caption: A World War One service medal similar to the one stolen in Todmorden between Thursday, April 16, and Sunday, April 19. The medal stolen in Todmorden did not have a ribbon but was engraved with "H.Mitchell" and is silver with a bar attached.
image:image.image:title: A World War One service medal similar to the one stolen in Todmorden between Thursday, April 16, and Sunday, April 19. The medal stolen in Todmorden did not have a ribbon but was engraved with "H.Mitchell" and is silver with a bar attached.
